mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sub_task (MAIN_TASK_ID, SUB_SUBJECT, TASK_STATUS_ID) VALUES (#{mainTaskId}, #{subSubject}, #{taskStatusId})
mapper.select: SELECT S.SUB_TASK_ID AS SUB_TASK_ID, S.MAIN_TASK_ID AS MAIN_TASK_ID, S.SUB_SUBJECT AS SUB_SUBJECT, S.ENROLLED_AT AS ENROLLED_AT, S.MODIFIED_AT AS MODIFIED_AT, T.TASK_STATUS_VALUE AS TASK_STATUS_VALUE FROM SUB_TASK S JOIN MAIN_TASK M ON S.MAIN_TASK_ID = M.MAIN_TASK_ID JOIN TASK_STATUS T ON S.TASK_STATUS_ID = T.TASK_STATUS_ID WHERE S.MAIN_TASK_ID = #{mainTaskId}
